meanings.sent1: The line at the amusement park felt interminable.
meanings.sent2: The journey through the forest seemed interminable.
meanings.sent3: The interminable wait for the pizza made us all hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the interminable hallway.
meanings.sent5: The interminable rain poured down without mercy.

meanings.sent1: The desert stretched out in an interminable expanse.
meanings.sent2: His imagination was as interminable as the universe.
meanings.sent3: The interminable possibilities of the future excited her.
meanings.sent4: Her love knew no interminable boundaries.
meanings.sent5: The interminable sky held countless stars.

meanings.sent1: The interminable noise of the construction site was deafening.
meanings.sent2: The interminable flow of the river soothed her mind.
meanings.sent3: The interminable chatter of the birds woke him up early.
meanings.sent4: His interminable dedication to his craft paid off.
meanings.sent5: The interminable cycle of seasons continued without fail.
